alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 11:47AM CST until further notice by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nebraska... Niobrara River near Sparks affecting Cherry County. For the Niobrara River...near Sparks...minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Niobrara River near Sparks. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flood stage. Minor flooding along the lower banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Tuesday /10:15 AM MST Tuesday/ the stage was 6.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near flood stage for the foreseeable future. Due to the ice jamming, fluctuations in river levels is possible. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. late tonight at midnight CST /1100 PM MST/.
